detaileddescription.para: SW Unit testing is accomplished through SWATT. The test cases are based on this design.

sect1.title: Verification of Resource Consumption
sect1.para: Not applicable. For more details see ResourcesConsumptionObjectives.

sect1.title: Verification by Review
sect1.para: The verification of the SWDD is performed by review. The review results can be found here: TBD (https://github-vni.geo.conti.de/bs-vw-meb-19-icas1-chorus/sw.sys.chorus_main_doc/issues/2773)

sect1.title: Verification by Testing
sect1.para: The tests are created using SWATT and are available in *.c.test files. For more details check the File section.
